title: Man-Made
description: One thing happens, to bring fear to the land and let the rats out of their holes, one thing happens, to let people know the value of their lives and home and makes them to forget about how they used to live before, one thing happens, to make the big things small and make the small things disappear, one things happens, one man changes and one man changes it, one thing happens...
author: Parsa Shekari
